amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1034 of the bill which embodies the Authorization for Use of Military Force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in House Report 112-88 to strike section 1034 of the bill, relating to the authorization for use of military force.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 234 (Roll no. 361).
